episodes.title: 3HO - the Kundalini Yoga Cult in Turmoil
episodes.description:
3HO - The Kundalini Yoga Cult in Turmoil 
[00:00:00] A good leader, a wise leader supports and mentors a successor.  
[00:00:03] Cult leaders, often because of their paranoia and narcissism, cannot tolerate rivals. 
[00:00:07] Yogi Bhajan left no successor of any stature within the organization. He belittled and castigated any leaders who stood out.  
[00:00:14] Over the years, many of the best and talented people left the group on seeing his corruption and abuses. 
[00:00:19] All he left behind when he died, was a legacy of infighting. 
[00:00:22] Witness the battle for control of the 3HO businesses, Yogi Tea and Golden Temple Foods. 
[00:00:27] And now there is a battle for control of the Siri Singh 
[00:00:30] Sahib Corporation, the organization that controls the 3HO Kundalini Yoga cult. 
[00:00:34] The fight is between those who believe the women that have come forward to tell their stories of sexual abuse by Yogi Bhajan, the so called 'moderates'  
[00:00:41] and those that deny any wrong doing by the cult leader, the 'deniers'. 
[00:00:44] Rumours of cheating and vote stacking by the deniers have surrounded the upcoming board election. 
[00:00:49] The law firm running the contest has balked at certifying the election of the board until the group can clean up the criteria for voting.  
[00:00:55] Dishonest, 'denier' teachers in foreign countries were willing to risk the freedom and [00:01:00] possibly even the very lives of their students to further their corrupt goals. 
[00:01:03] At stake in this election is the direction of the group, their willingness to settle fairly with the women who were sexually abused and the children damaged by the abusive 3HO schools in India. 
[00:01:12] The choices made in this election will determine the direction of the 3HO cult for years to come.

#YogiBhajan  #3HO #WhiteTantricYoga   #KundaliniYoga #Kundalini  #itISaCULT  #yogateachers #yoga #meditate #chanting #cult #cultawareness #rapist #childabuse #2ndGEN #miripiriacademy #3HOSchoolsInIndia #3HOReparations  #believewomen #metoo #premkamemoir #premkawhitebirdinagoldencage #3HOCultInfo #3HOCultDocumentary #TrueBelieversTheDarkEmpireOfYogiBhajan #rishiknots #GuruJagat

episodes.title: Kundalini Yoga Cult Organization to Rebrand?
episodes.description:
For more information, please go to 3HOCultInfo.wordpress.com

For years, it has been a controversial name. The “Siri Singh Sahib Corporation” or SSSC for short, is the title of the 3HO Kundalini Yoga group’s governing body. The name of the corporation comes from the cult leader Yogi Bhajan. The now deceased guru chose the grandiose title “the Siri Singh Sahib” for himself while claiming to be head of religious authority 
in the Western Hemisphere for the Sikh religion. 

This audacious claim was disputed by many Indian Sikhs at the time.The main governing body of the Golden Temple, Sikhism’s biggest shrine, also protested. Despite this, somehow his chosen title stood. 

When cult leader Bhajan died in 2004 the committee designated to run his sprawling empire was named the Siri Singh Sahib Corporation.

In the past two years, a convincing body of evidence has been building that Yogi Bhajan was a conman, a violent serial sexual abuser of his followers and a fake yogi. He destroyed families, taking children from their parents and sending them to abusive schools in India.

An unattributed source tells us that the group will be changing their name to the “Serial Sexual Sadist Corp”, or the SSSC for short. This allows them to demonstrate the seriousness of their resolve to show real change in the group’s direction and at the same time save money on printing new stationary.

Students of yoga, please Boycott the European Yoga Festival. Don't be complicit in this. Find something new, find something better.

episodes.title: 3 Former Secretaries of Kundalini Yoga/3HO Teacher Yogi Bhajan Speak Out About His Sexual Abuses.
episodes.description:
If you missed this Zoom call when it happened, it was incredibly impactful to hear three women close to Yogi Bhajan tell their stories of how they were sexually abused by him. If you are still in 3HO, or are practicing Kundalini Yoga, and are still a seeker of truth, you need to watch this and listen. These women are honest, vulnerable and years after his death, still dealing with the repercussions of his abuse.

There will be a replay of a Zoom call with 3 former secretaries of Kundalini Yoga/3HO Cult leader Yogi Bhajan. They tell their stories of sexual abuse by the supposed master.

Please save the date. If you missed the original call, these testimonies will be replayed on Feburary 12th, 2022.  The Zoom call is limited to 1,000 callers, so please respond early to assure your place on the call. 

Listen to the Full Stories on the Zoom Call
February 12th, 2022
9:00 AM PST
5:00 PM GMT

To receive an invite, please email YBabuses@gmail.com

3HOCultInfo.wordpress.com

episodes.title: Battle for Control of Yogi Bhajan's Kundalini Yoga 3HO Cult
episodes.description:
The Board that control's the remains of the Indian Sikh guru, Yogi Bhajan's Kundalini Yoga cult, 3HO are in a battle for control of the group's future and its assets. The current board is struggling to accept that their beloved leader was probably a creepy sexual predator who made up his 'Golden Chain' lineage, was violent with many of his students and may have been a criminal and conman. Bhajan has been dead since 2004, but the truth seems to be coming out about who he really was. Two 'ex officio' members of the main 3HO board are in conflict of interest, because they were both deeply involved in Bhajan's misdeeds.

For more information, see 3HOCultInfo.wordpress.com

00:05 3HO Has a Problem
00:37 Problem #1: Guru Amrit Kaur
02:30 Problem #2: Bibiji, Bhajan's Widow
03:57 Battle for control of the Board
04:20 Board Members
04:35 Organization Chart of For-Profit and Non-Profit Entities in 3HO

episodes.title: Kundalini Yoga leader Yogi Bhajan's Homophobia impacted the cult of 3HO
episodes.description:
For more information go to: 
https://3hocultinfo.wordpress.com/

One of Yogi Bhajan’s original 'secretaries' published a tell-all book and it brought forth a tumult of accusations from other women who were sexually abused by the group leader. The whole 3HO house of cards is crumbling and the, now deceased, leader has been revealed as having been a sexual serial predator, a conman and crook. 
Yogi Bhajan himself has been dead since 2004, but the truth about him is finally coming out. In early 2020, his first secretary, a woman he gave the spiritual name Premka, released a tell-all book, 30 years after she left the group. It wasn’t her first effort to reveal the truth about the yogi. She had sued him back in the late 80’s but lacked the resources to fight his legal delays. She ended up settling out of court. Because there was no Internet at the time, many in the 3 H O community didn’t hear about it, or if they did, were told to deny the story and quickly forgot what had actually happened.
In early 2020, the book, "Premka-White Bird in a Golden Cage" by Pamela Saharah Dyson, found an audience. Because of social media the news about the yogi's sexual predation could not be contained by 3 H O. The reaction to the book grew particularly strong in a Facebook group called “Beyond the Cage”. The Facebook group drew people out and the stories started to flow. So much so that the people in 3 H O couldn’t ignore the stories any more.
For more information, check out these articles: 
* LA Magazine - Yogi Bhajan Turned an L.A. Yoga Studio into a Juggernaut, and Left Two Generations of Followers Reeling from Alleged Abuse
https://www.lamag.com/citythinkblog/yogi-bhajan/

* Yoga Journal - A New Report Details Decades of Abuse at the Hands of Yogi Bhajan
https://www.yogajournal.com/yoga-101/abuse-in-kundalini-yoga/
* Santa Fe New Mexican - Legacy of Yogi Bhajan swirls in controversy years after his death
https://www.santafenewmexican.com/news/local_news/legacy-of-yogi-bhajan-swirls-in-controversy-years-after-his-death/article_c2abc18a-fe91-11ea-80d7-735e51ee0008.html
* Religion News Service - Yogi Bhajan, yoga guru and founder of 3HO, ‘more likely than not’ sexually abused followers, says report
https://religionnews.com/2020/08/18/yogi-bhajan-yoga-guru-and-founder-of-3ho-more-likely-than-not-sexually-abused-followers-says-report/
* This is a report commissioned by the 3HO group itself - Report on an Investigation into Allegations of Sexual and Related Misconduct by Yogi Bhajan 
https://epsweb.org/aob-report-into-allegations-of-misconduct/%0A%7D%7D%3C/ref%3E
Facebook Private Group: Beyond the Cage: https://www.facebook.com/groups/premka
Facebook Public Group: https://www.facebook.com/yogi.bhajan.abuses/
Premka's Book: https://www.amazon.com/Premka-White-Bird-Golden-Bhajan/dp/0578621886
Wikipedia Entry: beware of this one, it is still heavily influenced by some of the 'deniers' within 3HO https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harbhajan_Singh_Khalsa

For more details of the abusive treatment of gay people in 3HO by Yogi Bhajan, listen to GuruNischan’s Uncomfortable Conversations Podcast. 
Episode 4: Meeri Peeri 
Episode 18: Mani Niall
https://www.gurunischan.com/uncomfortableconversations/


A new web site has launched recently to help make the abuses of Yogi Bhajan and 3HO more accessible. It is called Abuse in Kundalini Yoga (https://abuse-in-kundalini-yoga.com). There are summaries of audio in text form and video links to the important parts of some of the longer but important video interviews. This is well worth looking at.

https://epsweb.org/aob-report-into-allegations-of-misconduct/%0A%7D%7D%3C/ref%3E

A new web site has launched recently to help make the abuses of Yogi Bhajan and 3HO more accessible. It is called Abuse in Kundalini Yoga (https://abuse-in-kundalini-yoga.com). There are summaries of audio in text form and video links to the important parts of some of the longer but important video interviews. This is well worth looking at.

episodes.title: What to do with "the Teachings' of 3HO Kundalini Yoga Guru Yogi Bhajan
episodes.description:
One of Yogi Bhajan’s original 'secretaries' published a tell-all book and it brought forth a tumult of accusations from other women who were sexually abused by the group leader. The whole 3HO house of cards is crumbling and the, now deceased, leader has been revealed as having been a sexual serial predator, a conman and crook. 
Yogi Bhajan himself has been dead since 2004, but the truth about him is finally coming out. In early 2020, his first secretary, a woman he gave the spiritual name Premka, released a tell-all book, 30 years after she left the group. It wasn’t her first effort to reveal the truth about the yogi. She had sued him back in the late 80’s but lacked the resources to fight his legal delays. She ended up settling out of court. Because there was no Internet at the time, many in the 3 H O community didn’t hear about it, or if they did, were told to deny the story and quickly forgot what had actually happened.
In early 2020, the book, "Premka-White Bird in a Golden Cage" by Pamela Saharah Dyson, found an audience. Because of social media the news about the yogi's sexual predation could not be contained by 3 H O. The reaction to the book grew particularly strong in a Facebook group called “Beyond the Cage”. The Facebook group drew people out and the stories started to flow. So much so that the people in 3 H O couldn’t ignore the stories any more.
For more information, check out these articles: 
* LA Magazine - Yogi Bhajan Turned an L.A. Yoga Studio into a Juggernaut, and Left Two Generations of Followers Reeling from Alleged Abuse
https://www.lamag.com/citythinkblog/yogi-bhajan/
* Yoga Journal - A New Report Details Decades of Abuse at the Hands of Yogi Bhajan
https://www.yogajournal.com/yoga-101/abuse-in-kundalini-yoga/
* Santa Fe New Mexican - Legacy of Yogi Bhajan swirls in controversy years after his death
https://www.santafenewmexican.com/news/local_news/legacy-of-yogi-bhajan-swirls-in-controversy-years-after-his-death/article_c2abc18a-fe91-11ea-80d7-735e51ee0008.html
* Religion News Service - Yogi Bhajan, yoga guru and founder of 3HO, ‘more likely than not’ sexually abused followers, says report
https://religionnews.com/2020/08/18/yogi-bhajan-yoga-guru-and-founder-of-3ho-more-likely-than-not-sexually-abused-followers-says-report/
* This is a report commissioned by the 3HO group itself - Report on an Investigation into Allegations of Sexual and Related Misconduct by Yogi Bhajan 
https://epsweb.org/aob-report-into-allegations-of-misconduct/%0A%7D%7D%3C/ref%3E
Facebook Private Group: Beyond the Cage: https://www.facebook.com/groups/premka
Facebook Public Group: https://www.facebook.com/yogi.bhajan.abuses/

There are summaries of audio in text form and video links to the important parts of some of the longer but important video interviews. This is well worth looking at.
